00063     public function run()
00064     {
00065         if ( ! $this->visible )
00066             return;
00067         
00068         $this->renderContent();
00069         
00070         echo '  </div><!-- ' . $this->contentCssClass . ' -->' . PHP_EOL;
00071         echo '</div><!-- ' . $this->cssClass . ' -->';
00072     }

00082     protected function generateHtml()
00083     {
00084         if ( ! $this->visible )
00085             return;
00086 
00087         if ( $this->jqui ) 
00088         {
00089             $this->headerCssClass = trim( 'ui-widget-header ' . $this->headerCssClass );
00090             $this->contentCssClass = trim( 'ui-widget-content ' . $this->contentCssClass );
00091         }
00092             
00093         echo PS::openTag( 'div', array( 'class' => $this->cssClass ) ) . PHP_EOL;
00094         if ( $this->title ) echo PS::tag( 'div', array( 'class' => $this->headerCssClass ), $this->title ) . PHP_EOL;
00095         echo PS::openTag( 'div', array( 'class' => $this->contentCssClass ) ) . PHP_EOL;
00096     }
00097     
00103     protected function renderContent()
00104     {
00105         $_sClass = get_class( $this );
00106         $_sClass[0] = strtolower( $_sClass[0] );
00107         if ( $this->autoRender ) $this->render( $_sClass );
00108     }
00109     
00114     private function getBaseOptions()
00115     {
00116         return array(
00117             'title_' => 'string',
00118             'cssClass_' => 'string:portlet-wrapper',
00119             'headerCssClass_' => 'string:portlet-header',
00120             'contentCssClass_' => 'string:portlet-content',
00121             'visible_' => 'bool:true',
00122             'autoRender_' => 'bool:true',
00123             'jqui_' => 'bool:true',
00124         );
